TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`4<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4)
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4);

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第一个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第二个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第三个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T4
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第四个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the fourth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg1
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第一个参数。

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg2
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第二个参数。

span.span: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg3
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第三个参数。

span.span: The third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg4
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第四个参数。

span.span: The fourth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封装一个方法，该方法具有四个参数且不返回值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has four parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用委托作为参数传递方法，而无需显式声明自定义委托。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封装的方法必须对应于此委托定义的方法签名。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 这意味着，封装的方法必须具有均按值传递给它的四个参数并且不能返回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have four parameters that are all passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. (在 C# 中，该方法必须返回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必须由定义`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 构造。construct. 它也可以是返回一个值，则忽略该值的方法。）通常情况下，这种方法用于执行操作。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用的方法，具有四个参数并返回一个值，请使用泛型改为委托。To reference a method that has four parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 当你使用委托时，您无需显式定义用于封装具有四个参数的方法的委托。When you use the delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with four parameters. 例如，下面的代码显式声明名为的委托`StringCopy`，并将分配到的引用`CopyStrings`给其委托实例的方法。For example, the following code explicitly declares a delegate named `StringCopy` and assigns a reference to the `CopyStrings` method to its delegate instance. [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Delegate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Action~4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/vb/Delegate.vb#1)] 下面的示例简化了此代码实例化而不是显式定义一个新委托，并为其赋值命名的方法的委托。The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it. [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Action4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Action~4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/vb/Action4.vb#2)] 此外可以使用委托与匿名方法在 C# 中，如以下示例所示。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates. (有关匿名方法的介绍，请参阅[匿名方法](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md)。)(For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Anon.cs#3)] 你还可以分配一个 lambda 表达式到委托实例，如以下示例所示。You can also assign a lambda expression to an delegate instance, as the following example illustrates. (有关 lambda 表达式的简介，请参阅[Lambda 表达式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md)。)(For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Lambda.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Action~4#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/vb/lambda.vb#4)]
